EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_SpringOne_Platform_2018.S1P - Past Attendees 7-31-18
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive discount for SpringOne Platform alumni inside
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We enjoyed having you at SpringOne Platform last year and would love to host you again, this time in Washington, D.C. And since you’d be a regular, we’d like to offer you $100 off your ticket—just use special discount code Attendee_Alumni_100 <[[https://2018.event.springoneplatform.io/register/registration/select?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-alumini-2018]]>.
From September 24–27, SpringOne Platform <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-alumini-2018]]> will bring together leading software companies, enterprises, and cloud experts to collaborate, share knowledge, and create transformational software. You can see a list of our confirmed sessions here <[[https://springoneplatform.io/2018/sessions?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-alumini-2018]]>, with more additions to come within the next month.
We hope to see you there, Kathryn
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. <[[https://springoneplatform.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=s1p-training-agenda-email]]>Unsubscribe <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[http://connect.pivotal.io/subscription-management.html]]>.
